about_the_game:
＜The Story＞
Humans were engaged in their life, progressing and developing in all fields of science
when an unexpected guest arrived from space !!!
a lifeless civilization, robots that came to consume the earth's resources, Especially its minerals, and eliminate any kind of life on it
Mankind fought a huge, unprecedented war, the first of its kind and they lost. humans lost the war, with more than 80% of them died or unfound
The life that humans knew were gone, cities were in ruins, and the rest of humans were either trying to hide or join the resistance.
luckily fate was on their side. Humans were able to find a ship that fell during the war
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
It takes 40 to 60 minutes to finish the game
Objective: * to collect the three pieces is to eliminate robots
* Solve the Puzzles
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
A horror game based on an attempt to survive inside a space ship
detailed_description:
＜The Story＞
Humans were engaged in their life, progressing and developing in all fields of science
when an unexpected guest arrived from space !!!
a lifeless civilization, robots that came to consume the earth's resources, Especially its minerals, and eliminate any kind of life on it
Mankind fought a huge, unprecedented war, the first of its kind and they lost. humans lost the war, with more than 80% of them died or unfound
The life that humans knew were gone, cities were in ruins, and the rest of humans were either trying to hide or join the resistance.
luckily fate was on their side. Humans were able to find a ship that fell during the war

It takes 40 to 60 minutes to finish the game

name: il

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core or similar
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Radeon HD 7970
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Radeon HD 7970
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

short_description: Robots invaded the earth, you have to explore their ship to eliminate them.A horror game based on an attempt to survive inside a space ship
